data.name: The Low Road OST
data.detailed_description:
The music on XGen Studios' point-and-click adventure, The Low Road, is an original score of swirling psychedelia and dusty Americana.

Track List:

1. Take Flight (ft. Win Well) (01:43)
2. Being a Spy (02:20)
3. Outbound Research (03:25)
4. Outside Intelligence Pt. 1 (02:07)
5. Rhyme Time (02:25)
6. The Double Decker (01:33)
7. Bloodhounds Hold Muzak/2 Years Experience (02:13)
8. Penderbrook Motors (01:14)
9. Daytime TV/Left in the Field (01:51)
10. Your Mission (01:21)
11. Into the Field (ft. Win Well) (01:19)
12. Stop the Boat (ft. Win Well) (02:18)
13. Guard Punch-Out (01:22)
14. Rev Inc. (02:07)
15. A Way In (01:20)
16. Torch Entrance (ft. Win Well) (01:06)
17. Citizens of Rev Pt. 1 (01:25)
18. Landscape of the Night Sky (02:01)
19. Sun and Moon Puzzle (01:47)
20. Bliss and Blessings Pt. 1/Exodus (02:09)
21. Bliss and Blessings Pt. 2/The Ascension (03:16)
22. Citizens of Rev Pt. 2 (ft. Win Well) (02:01)
23. Testing Facility (01:34)
24. Crash Test (00:54)
25. Earthquake (02:36)
26. Coming Down (ft. Win Well) (02:50)
27. Perpetual Motion Petunia (02:37)
28. Crashed FIKUS (ft. Win Well) (03:03)
29. Round Up (01:33)
30. Guard Punch-Out (Bonus High Speed) (00:43)
31. In the Woods, Where They Meet (01:48)
32. Self-Destruct (ft. Win Well) (01:51)
33. False Endings (01:40)
34. Especially You (03:51)
35. Outside Intelligence Pt. 2 (02:09)
36. Coffee Break (01:19)
37. The Triple Decker (01:43)
38. Taking the Scenic Route (01:24)
39. The Docile Woods (ft. Win Well) (02:42)
40. Docillio Zoo (01:23)
41. The Docillio Faire (03:39)
42. Original is Always Better (02:16)
43. Fanfare for the Manatee Hugh (01:28)
44. The Soothmaker (00:55)
45. Vivat Docillio! Fortis Docillio! (00:49)
46. Sacrifice for our Manatee Hugh (ft. Win Well) (01:52)
47. The Great Debate (02:05)
48. All Kinds of Advancements (ft. Win Well) (01:53)
49. Because... (ft. Win Well) (01:11)
50. End Credits (ft. Win Well) (01:05)

All files are in .mp3 format and are located in the "Eric Cheng - The Low Road OST" sub directory.

Credits:

Music by Eric Cheng

Voice acting by Emily Bachynski, Chris Bell and Jim Cuming on Track 9, and Graham Nichol on Tracks 20 and 21. Dialogue written by Leif Oleson-Cormack

Illustration by Scott Carmichael

Tracks 1, 11, 12, 16, 22, 26, 28, 32, 39, 46, 48, 49, 50 feature excerpts from Win Well's Songs On The Low Road EP.

data.short_description: The music on XGen Studios' point-and-click adventure, The Low Road, is an original score of swirling psychedelia and dusty Americana.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dualcore
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatable Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Embedded

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Embedded

data.legal_notice: ©2017 XGen Studios Inc. The Low Road, XGen Studios and the XGen Studios and The Low Road logos are trademarks of XGen Studios Inc.
